title: Tranquility
description: Tranquility Spirit Control needs a researcher, and Arta has all the library skills anyone could want. Unfortunately, doing research for a ghost-hunting company isn't like writing college papers. No one told her about the lunatics who LIKE being haunted, or the things some people will do to bury the past. No one expected her old friend to suddenly mention marriage. Most of all, no one thought the ghost might come after her...
author: Juniper Shore
